input_text:
Job Title: Onsite Recruiter

Location: St Charles, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Human Resources, Management

Description:
HireLevel is looking for an Onsite Recruiter with a focus in account management to join our team in St. Charles, MO. At HireLevel, we partner with employers to ensure they're hiring the right person for the job with most of our positions focused on light-industrial and warehouse roles. This is a fast-paced position that requires you to be in constant communication with both candidates and clients, so being a people-person is a must! If you enjoy meeting new people, have a competitive drive and a problem-solving mindset, this position is for you.
This is an hourly position, paid at $22-25/hr, based on experience. The hours for this role are Monday - Friday, 8 am to 5 pm, but that shift may vary based on business needs. 
About HireLevel.We are a woman-owned company based in the Midwest providing human capital management and recruitment services nationwide. Basically, if it has anything to do with HR, we can do it! Our goal is to help our clients streamline their HR tasks and make payroll and hiring a breeze.HireLevel believes that when the right people come together, creativity thrives, opportunities appear, and business grows. We are a company of doers and thinkers who believe work and fun can get along. Taking care of business begins with taking care of our people, our clients, and the communities we live in. At HireLevel, we welcome individual differences which represents a significant part of not only our culture but also our reputation.
A day in the life as an Onsite RecruiterEach day with HireLevel will be different but the focus will remain the same, placing candidates into jobs that turn into careers. We will work to get you quickly up to speed on our clients and their expectations of our partnership. We source candidates, interview, and prep them for a successful meeting with the client. After they get the job, we help keep them on track and achieve the goal of going temp to hire. Our Onsite Recruiters work together with the client to address staffing needs and create customized recruitment plans.
At HireLevel, there isn't a "one size fits all" solution for our clients' recruitment needs, and that's okay! You'll be supported by co-workers who are ready to jump in and help find the best solution for our customers' needs. We work together to make sure you have the tools you need to be successful!
What you need to be qualified for this jobTo be qualified for this job, you must consider yourself a "people-person" with a competitive drive, highly organized and able to think outside the box. You'll be engaging with our clients daily so it is vital that you are able to understand what we can provide them and can speak to HireLevel's capabilities. The world of recruiting is always evolving, so willingness to learn and comprehend training is necessary. And of course, you can't be scared to pick up the phone. While many of our candidates come into office, you must also be comfortable with smiling and dialing.
This is an on-site position at our client location which is a manufactuing setting. The Onsite Recruiter will need to be comfortable going on the manufactuing floor when necessary. 
Are you ready to join the team? If you think you're the right candidate for this job please go ahead and apply! Your resume will go directly to our hiring team who will contact you regarding the next steps.
HireLevel is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Onsite Recruiter
output_json.summary: HireLevel is seeking an Onsite Recruiter with a focus on account management.
job_responsibilities: Constant communication with candidates and clients
Ensuring smooth payroll and hiring processes
Helping candidates transition from temporary to permanent positions
output_json.physical_requirements: Comfortable with occasional visits to manufacturing floors
output_json.company_information: HireLevel is a woman-owned company providing human capital management and recruitment services nationwide.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: HireLevel is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Placing candidates into jobs that turn into careers, sourcing candidates, interviewing, preparing candidates for meetings with clients, helping candidates achieve temp-to-hire status, addressing staffing needs, creating customized recruitment plans.
Comfortable with occasional visits to manufacturing floors.
